metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9358 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Docker before 1.3.3 does not properly validate image IDs, which allowsremote attackers to conduct path traversal attacks and spoof repositoriesvia a crafted image in a (1) "docker load" operation or (2) "registrycommunications."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9358` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4~14.04.1').
